name: 启动沙盒1
title: Spiral of Destinies 1
text:
You can return to Iria from Elysium by crossing the Spiral of Destinies.
And you can also return to Elysium anytime afterward.

name: 启动沙盒2
title: Spiral of Destinies 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>The Key of Destiny is needed to enter the Spiral of Destinies.
<sprite=10>You can enter Spiral of Destinies more than once to experience different stories and endings of Sword of Convallaria.
<sprite=10>You can select beacons and companions when you start the Spiral.

<size=28><style=C4>Beacons and Companions</style></size>
<sprite=10>The beacon determines the various initial states of the Spiral.
<sprite=10>Certain beacons can make it easier for the Spiral to follow a certain plot.
<sprite=10>Companions that follow you into the cycle can participate in battles, but will not affect the story.

name: 乐土角色1
title: Elysium Character 1
text:
Everyone you have ever met or are destined to meet
has the opportunity to gather in the Elysium.

name: 乐土角色2
title: Elysium Character 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>In Elysium, you can collect characters that appeared in Spiral of Destinies.
<sprite=10>Characters in Elysium and Spiral of Destinies are independent of each other.

<size=28><style=C4>Differences with Spiral of Destinies</style></size>
<sprite=10>The characters in Elysium will stay with the team forever once they join.
<sprite=10>No matter what happens to the characters in Spiral of Destinies, the ones in Elysium will not be affected.
<sprite=10>Character progression in Elysium is not carried over to the Spiral of Destinies.
<sprite=10>Some features are unlocked as you progress through The Fool's Journey.

name: 乐土角色升级1
title: Elysium Character Level-up 1
text: The Elysium Character can quickly level up by consuming Common Exp.

name: 乐土角色升级2
title: Elysium Character Level-up 2
text:
Attention: the Elysium Character Level must be lower than the Voyager Level.
In order to make the character more powerful, upgrade the Voyager Level as soon as possible.

name: 武器装备1
title: Weapons 1
text:
Equipping weapons will boost character stats.
Certain weapons possess [Innate Skills] to further increase their power.

name: 进阶1
title: Rank-up 1
text: Rank-up the characters to learn exclusive skills of the characters.

name: 进阶2
title: Rank-up 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Characters’ attributes can be improved by Rank-up.
<sprite=10>The Rank-up cap is based on the character level.

<size=28><style=C4>Learning Skills</style></size>
<sprite=10>Upon reaching certain nodes, you can pick one from two skills.
<sprite=10>Different Rank-up skills grant different Attribute bonuses.
<sprite=10>Missed skills can be learned by using Castalia.

name: 交错的世界1
title: Crossing Worlds 1
text:
You can get various resources
via challenging the [Crossing Worlds] evey day.

name: 交错的世界2
title: Crossing Worlds 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>There are various stages in Crossing Worlds, and clearing the stages will earn you various rewards.

<size=28><style=C4>Attempts and Extra Reward</style></size>
<sprite=10>Some stages have a daily attempt limit. Failing a stage does not consume the attempt.
<sprite=10>Some stages have daily Extra Reward chances. You can receive more rewards as long as the Extra Reward chances are not depleted.
<sprite=10>Both the Attempt limit and the Extra Reward limit reset at 00:00 a.m. each day.

name: 交错的世界3
title: Crossing Worlds 3
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Sweep Combat</style></size>
<sprite=10>Sweep is unlocked after clearing Stage 2-15 of [The Fool's Journey]. 
<sprite=10>The Leader can select a character that meets the Sweep requirements to fight for you in the Crossing Worlds, and then earn corresponding rewards.
<sprite=10>Each character can only participate in 1 sweep team simultaneously.

name: 角色升星1
title: Character Star Up 1
text:
Trait effects can be greatly strengthened by increasing the Star Level.
Memories of the same-name character are needed.

name: 乐土角色升星
title: Character Star Up 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Upon obtaining a duplicate Elysium character through any means, the character will be automatically converted into Memories of that character.
<sprite=10>You can acquire more Character Memories from Memory Retrieval or Summon.
<sprite=10>First clear does not consume challenge attempts.

name: 武器升级1
title: Gear Enhancement 1
text: The gear in Elysium can be leveled up to increase its attributes.

name: 武器升级2
title: Gear Enhancement 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Radiant Powder can be used to advance gear.
<sprite=10>After reaching a certain level, you need to use Radiant Ore to increase the level cap of your gear.
<sprite=10>Gear can be greatly improved by Staring Up. However, it requires consuming same-name gear.
<sprite=10>You can use Engraving to add engraving effects and random attributes to gear.
<sprite=10>When both the weapon and trinket have engraving effects, they can be combined to activate Engraving Resonance.

name: 实战训练1
title: Level-up Training 1
text: Clear stages in [Level-up Training] to get plenty of Common Exp.

name: 实战训练2
title: Level-up Training 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Obtain Common Exp to level up Elysium characters.
<sprite=10>You have 1 Extra Rewards chance per day.
<sprite=10>First clear does not consume the Extra Rewards chance.

name: 武器突破
title: Weapon Breakthrough
text: [Radiant Ore] is needed for breakthrough after a piece of gear reaches a certain level

name: 光辉锻铸1
title: Radiant Forging 1
text: Clear stages in [Radiant Forging] to get plenty of weapon enhancement materials.

name: 光辉锻铸2
title: Radiant Forging 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>You can obtain Radiant Powder and Radiant Ore, which can be used to advance and breakthrough Elysium weapons.
<sprite=10>At higher difficulty levels, stages in Radiant Forging will drop engraving chests containing materials for weapon engraving.
<sprite=10>You have 1 Extra Rewards chance per day.
<sprite=10>First clear does not consume the Extra Rewards chance.

name: 天赋学习
title: Talent
text:
You can unlock Elysium Tactical Skills and increase the ATK and DEF of all classes by learning talents.
However, it requires a valuable resource <sprite=10>Star Particles.

name: 记忆寻回1
title: Memory Retrieval 1
text: Clear stages in [Memory Retrieval] to get Character Memories

name: 记忆寻回2
title: Memory Retrieval 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Memory Retrieval is a rare challenge and can only be cleared once a day. 
<sprite=10>The type of memories you can obtain depends on the character in battle. 
<sprite=10>The higher the difficulty of the stage, the more the shards acquired.
<sprite=10>For each deployed character, up to 3 Memory Shards can be collected.

name: 荣耀之战1
title: Clash 1
text:
You can earn seasonal rewards
by participating in the Clash
and attacking other players' bases.

name: 荣耀之战2
title: Clash 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>Participate in Clash to earn Activity Points and complete season quests.
<sprite=10>Accumulate Glory to rank up for more rewards.
<sprite=10>Complete season quests to earn Activity Points and exchange for bountiful season rewards.
<sprite=10>At the start of a new season, the Merits from the last season will be automatically converted into Elysium Coins.

<size=28><style=C4>Daily Reward Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>Defeat enemies or destroy enemy facilities in battle to earn Merits, which can be used for base and facility upgrades.
<sprite=10>You can earn up to 100 Merits in a battle.
<sprite=10>You can earn up to 300 Merits per day with 5 challenge attempts.
<sprite=10>You can quit the battle at any time and still earn Merits.
<sprite=10>Defending against other leaders' attacks can also grant you Merits and Glory.
<sprite=10>At the start of a new season, your points will be deducted based on your division in the last season.

name: 星辰试炼
title: Star Trial I
text: Clear stages in [Star Trial] to get talent level-up materials.

name: 星辰试炼
title: Star Trial II
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>You can get Particles of Star after clearing the Star Trial.
<sprite=10>You can get corresponding materials for upgrading talents via selecting different trials.
<sprite=10>You have 1 chance of high rewards per day.
<sprite=10>The Great Bonus will not be consumed when the stage is cleared for the first time.

<size=28><style=C4>Daily Trials</style></size>
<sprite=10>Star Trial 1 (High Rewards) is open every Monday and Thursday;
<sprite=10>Star Trial 2 (High Rewards) is open every Tuesday and Friday;
<sprite=10>Star Trial 3 (High Rewards) is open every Wednesday and Saturday.
<sprite=10>All trials are open every Sunday, while stages share high reward times.

name: 神兵试炼1
title: Weaponry Trial I
text: Clear [Weaponry Trial] stages to get weapons or trinkets.

name: 神兵试炼2
title: Weaponry Trial II
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Weaponry Trial can only be cleared once per day.
<sprite=10>In Weaponry Trial, you can obtain different weapons by clearing different stages.
<sprite=10>Attempts are not consumed when you clear a stage for the first time.

<size=28><style=C4>Daily Trials</style></size>
<sprite=10>Weaponry Trial I is available every Monday and Thursday;
<sprite=10>Weaponry Trial II is available every Tuesday and Friday;
<sprite=10>Weaponry Trial III is available every Wednesday and Saturday.
<sprite=10>All stages are available every Sunday, with shared Attempts.

name: 护石装备
title: Tarot Whisper
text:
The Tarot Whisper serves as the special gear
with powerful skills.

name: 代行作战
title: Sweep Combat
text: You can deploy characters that meet the conditions to fight in the [Crossing Worlds] for you and gain the corresponding reward.

name: 塔罗遗力
title: Tarot Residual I
text: Clear [Tarot Residual] stages to get Tarot Whispers (Series I).

name: 塔罗遗力
title: Tarot Residual II
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>You can get Tarot Whispers by clearing stages of Tarot Residual.
<sprite=10>Each stage series only drops specific Tarot Whispers.
<sprite=10>You have 1 Extra Reward chance per day.
<sprite=10>The Extra Reward chance is not consumed when clearing a stage for the first time.

<size=28><style=C4>Daily Trials</style></size>
<sprite=10>Tarot Residual I is available on every Monday and Thursday;
<sprite=10>Tarot Residual II is available on every Tuesday and Friday;
<sprite=10>Tarot Residual III is available every Wednesday and Saturday.
<sprite=10>All stages are available on every Sunday, with shared Extra Reward chances.

name: 护石强化1
title: Tarot Whisper Enhancement 1
text:
You can level up Tarot Whispers using Tarot Essence.
New attributes will be granted after leveling up.

name: 护石强化2
title: Tarot Whisper Enhancement 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>You can break down extra Tarot Whispers in your inventory.
<sprite=10>The Tarot Essence gained by breaking down the Tarot Whisper can be used to level up other Tarot Whispers.

<size=28><style=C4>Levelling Up</style></size>
<sprite=10>Tarot Whisper level cap is based on the Voyager Level.
<sprite=10>Different rarities of Tarot Whisper have different level caps.
<sprite=10>Legendary ones can reach up to Lv. 60, Epic to Lv. 45, Rare to Lv. 30, and Common to Lv.15.
<sprite=10>Attribute bonus will be activated when reaching Lv.15, Lv.30, Lv.45, and Lv.60.
<sprite=10>The next Attribute bonus can be previewed when reaching Lv.20, Lv.35, and Lv.50.

name: 命运印记
title: Destiny Traces 1
text:
Every cycle in Spiral of Destinies
leaves a permanent mark on Elysium.

name: 命运印记
title: Destiny Traces 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>The events and achievements you completed in Spiral of Destinies are displayed here. 
<sprite=10>Once a new record is achieved, you can claim corresponding rewards that can be used in the Elysium. 
<sprite=10>These records are permanent and won't reset when a new story begins. 

<size=28><style=C4>Knowledge Level</style></size>
<sprite=10>All events in Spiral of Destinies will be converted into Knowledge at the end of the Chapter. 
<sprite=10>Increase your Knowledge Level by accumulating Knowledge to earn valuable rewards.

name: 装备升星
title: Star Level Up of Weapon
text:
Gear stats can be greatly improved by Star Level Up.
Namesake gear is needed.

name: 征服之塔1
title: Tower of Conquest 1
text:
Elysium's most challenging battlefield. Few survive...
but those that do, shall be generously rewarded.

name: 征服之塔2
title: Tower of Conquest 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>■ Basic Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>You can claim weekly rewards by collecting a certain number of Tower Emblems every week.
<sprite=10>When a floor is cleared for the first time, you can claim the chest for this floor, increase the Level Rewards by 1 level, and unlock more Level Rewards.
<sprite=10>The Conqueror's Insignia in the Level Rewards can be used to exchange for resources in the shop.
<sprite=10>If you have claimed the Level Rewards for a lower floor, the chest of the next floor will contain the reward difference.
<sprite=10>Failing a challenge will deduct one challenge attempt, with one attempt recovered every 30 minutes.

<size=28><style=C4>■ Refresh Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>After the weekly refresh, the [Environment], [Stage Mutation], and enemy types will change accordingly.
<sprite=10>Based on your highest recorded floor, if you fail to clear any stage on that floor during the week, you will drop 2 floors after the refresh; if you clear any stage, you will drop 1 floor.
<sprite=10>You will drop to the highest recorded floor minus 2 floors, but no lower than Floor 2 of the Tower of Conquest.
<sprite=10>After clearing all stages on Floor 10, you will drop to Floor 9 at most after the refresh.

name: 拖拽上阵
title: Drag for Layout
text: Drag characters to the battlefield for layout

name: 克制关系
title: Role Counters
text:
Each role has a specific counter. Units deal more DMG against countered roles. 
The role counter will be visible during attack confirmation.

name: 信息面板
title: Info Panel
text:
You can view the detailed information of the selected unit by tapping the brief information panel. 
After understanding traits and skills of different units, you can clear stages more easily.

name: 高度优势
title: Height Advantage
text:
You can gain ATK and DEF bonuses when the height advantage is more than 2. 
You can confirm whether the height advantage has been triggered by this turn in the right reminder.

name: 战术技能01
title: Tactical Skill
text:
Use Tactical Skills by pressing the Tactics button in the lower right.
In battle preparation, you can assign Tactical Skills using the Tactics button.

name: 战术技能02
title: TP
text:
Using Tactical Skill costs TP.
TP slowly recovers after each turn or after triggering Counters or Back Attacks.

name: 沙盒训练1
title: Battle Training 1
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>[Exp Training] Gain the EXP required for character level-up by completing a certain number of turns.
<sprite=10>[Class Skill Training] Complete a certain number of turns to randomly generate 3 skills and choose to learn one of them. The skill training cap can be increased through facility upgrades.
<sprite=10>[Tailored Training Program] Choose Tailored Training Programs suitable for the characters, and learn by completing a certain number of turns. Tailored Training Programs can be unlocked through Quests, Random Events, Random Shops, etc.

name: 沙盒训练2
title: Skill Training
text: You can select one from the three skills.

name: 沙盒训练3
title: Tailored Training
text: You can select the designated special item and learn it via training about certain weeks.

name: 沙盒锻造1
title: Forging
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>[Blueprint Forging]: Consumes blueprints and materials to produce gear. The gear and forging costs are determined by the selected blueprint.
<sprite=10>[Normal Forging]: Consumes materials only to produce standard gear.
<sprite=10>[Material Forging]: Produces the specified forging materials.

name: 沙盒锻造2（暂隐藏，需重做）
title: Custom Forging
text: The result is up to the forging plan. Luxite can be added to increase the huge success rate.

name: 晶石工坊1
title: Luxite Workshop
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
Experiment Count can be obtained by completing experiment missions, which yield resources.
The experiment missions including:
<sprite=10>Experimenting specified Tactical Skills in battle.
<sprite=10>Submitting certain amounts of resources.
<sprite=10>Assigning characters of specific classes to help.

name: 沙盒收集册1
title: Destiny Traces
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Play the Spiral of Destinies to increase your Knowledge Level and gain abundant rewards.
<sprite=10>The important events and achievements you have accomplished in "Sword of Convallaria" will be displayed here.
<sprite=10>Upon achieving some new records, you can claim the corresponding special rewards in Elysium.
<sprite=10>These records are permanent and will not reset when the story restarts.

name: 沙盒收集册2
title: Knowledge Level
text: You can claim rewards after increasing Knowledge Level.

name: 周目科技盘1
title: Astral Path
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>You can earn Astral Tears by clearing Spiral of Destinies.
<sprite=10>Tracks in the Astral Path can be activated by consuming Astral Tears.
<sprite=10>As your Track grows, you can unlock more characters, skills, and even some interesting hidden events in Spiral of Destinies.

name: 周目科技盘2
title: Basic Rules
text: You can activate nodes in the Astral Path by using Astral Tears.

name: 启动沙盒2
title: Destiny Gate
text: You can select one beacon when starting, which determines this round of Spiral of Destinies' state.

name: 进阶试炼
title: Rank-up Trial
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>You can get rank-up materials for Elysium characters by clearing Rank-up Trials.
<sprite=10>Choose different stages to obtain rank-up materials for different classes.
<sprite=10>You have 1 Extra Rewards attempt per day.
<sprite=10>The Extra Rewards attempt is not consumed when you clear a stage for the first time.

<size=28><style=C4>Daily Trials</style></size>
<sprite=10>All stages in Rank-up Trials are open all-day for challenge.
<sprite=10>However, Extra Rewards stages rotate among the five roles from Monday to Friday.
<sprite=10>On Saturdays and Sundays, all stages offer extra rewards, and the Extra Reward attempt is shared across all stages.

name: 交错的世界2
title: Extra Reward
text: You can receive extra items from stages by consuming Extra Reward chances.

name: 交错的世界3
title: Remaining
text: Challenging requires certain times, but if you fail, the consumed times will be returned.

name: 网游主线1
title: The Fool's Journey
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Participate in [The Fool's Journey] to unlock more features and stages in [Crossing Worlds].

<size=28><style=C4>Star Rating</style></size>
<sprite=10>Based on your combat performance, you will receive a star rating of 1 to 3 stars.
<sprite=10>Once you collect a certain number of stars in a chapter, milestone chests will be unlocked.
<sprite=10>Once you achieve 3 stars in some stages, Hard Stages that are more challenging will be unlocked.
<sprite=10>Challenging Hard Stages and cleared stages does not cost Endurance.

name: 网游主线2
title: The Fool's Journey
text: Some challenging stages will be unlocked after reaching Star Level 3.

name: 乐土家园1
title: Elysium Homeland 1
text:
You can freely place furniture in the designated area. 
Some specific objects outside the area can also be replaced. 
Pay attention to various limited time events and collect more furniture.

name: 乐土家园2
title: Elysium Homeland 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Moveable Furniture</style></size>
<sprite=10>Moveable furniture can be freely placed, moved, and turned in the designated area. 
<sprite=10>Elysium has furniture placement areas indoors. 
<sprite=10>In general, movable furniture can be more freely placed and is suitable for designing a more personalized home. 

<size=28><style=C4>Immovable Furniture</style></size>
<sprite=10>Immovable furniture can only be changed at predetermined positions. 
<sprite=10>Immovable furniture cannot be moved or rotated. Each Immovable Furniture position comes with starting furniture by default.

name: 乐土家园3
title: Elysium Home 3
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Invite Characters</style></size>
<sprite=10>In addition to decorating your home, you can also invite characters to stand in specific positions.
<sprite=10>You can only invite characters you have obtained through Summons.
<sprite=10>Characters in random dialog events cannot be invited or sent off during the events.

<size=28><style=C4>Characters' State of Mind</style></size>
<sprite=10>Invited characters gain Bond EXP at regular intervals.
<sprite=10>Bond EXP can be used to increase Bond Level in the Bond system.
<sprite=10>Invited characters gain Bond EXP faster at a higher Coziness Level.
<sprite=10>Collecting Furniture can increase the Coziness Level of your home.

name: 大型活动-商城兑换
title: Time-Limited Event Info
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>After an event starts, you can complete the designated stages to collect dropped items and redeem rewards in the event shop.
<sprite=10>Additional drop bonuses are available after using recommended characters (except the first clear).
<sprite=10>Some stages will unlock as the event unfolds; there are two modes to choose from: a Free Mode (with your own Elysium characters) and a Strategic Mode (where trial characters are provided).
<sprite=10>You can switch between the modes and get the first clear rewards respectively. The clearing of either mode will unlock the subsequent challenges.

<size=28><style=C4>Other Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>[Extra Rewards] chances will be refreshed at 00:00 a.m. every day.
<sprite=10>Once an event ends, you cannot enter the event stages. However, you can still redeem rewards during the redemption period.

name: 中型活动1-累计兑换
title: Time-Limited Event Info
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>After an event starts, players can complete the designated stages to collect Crusade Points. Upon reaching specific points, rewards can be claimed.
<sprite=10>Additional drop bonuses are available after using recommended characters (except the first stage clear).
<sprite=10>Some stages will unlock as the event unfolds; there are two modes to choose from: a Free Mode (with your own Elysium characters) and a Strategic Mode (where trial characters are provided).
<sprite=10>You can switch between the modes and get the first pass rewards respectively. The clearing of either mode will unlock the subsequent challenges.

<size=28><style=C4>Other Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>[High Reward] times will be refreshed at 00:00 a.m. every day.
<sprite=10>Once an event ends, you cannot enter the event stages.

name: 网游科技
title: Talent
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>After clearing the Star Trial, you can get materials for enhancing talent skills. 
<sprite=10>After activating or upgrading talent skill entries, you can get corresponding [Attribute Bonus] or learn [Tactical Commands]. 
<sprite=10>Improving Talent Ranking unlocks more talent skill entries. 
<sprite=10>Talent Ranking are Iron, Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, and Radiant in ascending order.

name: 网游羁绊
title: Bond 1
text:
The Bond between you and the Elysium characters
will make them stronger on the battlefield.

name: 网游羁绊
title: Bond 2
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>Collect Bond EXP to increase Bond Level and gain all attribute bonus for characters. 
<sprite=10>Reach certain Bond Levels to unlock character avatars and personalized nicknames for some characters.

<size=28><style=C4>Bond EXP</style></size>
<sprite=10> Press and hold the [Spiritual Homology] button to consume [Spirit of Hearts] and gain Bond EXP. 500 [Spirit of Hearts] is recovered daily upon login, with a maximum storage of 3,000 [Spirit of Hearts].
<sprite=10>After clearing certain stages, a small amount of Bond EXP for corresponding characters is granted based on the amount of [Endurance] you have consumed. 
<sprite=10>Characters moving in Elysium can gain Bond EXP over time and when triggering Character Adventures.
<sprite=10>Gifting a character [Bond Charm] yields a significant amount of Bond EXP.

name: 沙盒疗养
title: Haven
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Placing a character in [Rest] can quickly recover their Stamina. 
<sprite=10>Except for mandatory deployment, characters in [Rest] cannot be used in a [Quest].

name: 沙盒旅店
title: Tavern
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>You can spend a certain amount of funds to [recruit] new characters in the Mercenary Group. 
<sprite=10>The Recruitment List is refreshed once every few weeks. 
<sprite=10>Upgrading facilities can unlock more recruitment spots and faction characters.

name: 沙盒委托
title: Quest
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>Most [Battle Events] are related to important plots. 
<sprite=10>[Quests] include battles and dispatches. You can receive various rewards after completing them.
<sprite=10>[Faction] displays each major faction's influence, territory, and current situation.

name: 沙盒祝福
title: Blessing
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>A powerful temporary Blessing can be obtained after selecting a designated character to participate in the ritual. 
<sprite=10>The ritual will consume a certain amount of time and Luxite Energy, which will gradually recover over time. 
<sprite=10>The effect of the General Ritual can be enhanced through the facility construction in the Sanctuary and the maintenance of sacred objects.

name: 公会
title: Guild
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Activeness Rewards</style></size>
<sprite=10>Complete daily quests and collect Activity Points, which will count towards the weekly Guild Activity Points. Each member can contribute a maximum of 100 points per day.
<sprite=10>Guild members can collect rewards upon reaching specific weekly activity milestones. If you rejoin a Guild, previously collected rewards for the week will not reset.
<sprite=10>You can join another Guild immediately after leaving a Guild for the first time. Subsequent guild quits require a 3-hour cooldown period.

<size=28><style=C4>Guild Management</style></size>
<sprite=10>The Guild Master can appoint or remove Guild Officer.
<sprite=10>If the Master has not logged in for more than 7 days, Officer or other members may initiate an impeachment. This triggers a 2-day observation period for the Master.
<sprite=10>If the Master remains inactive during the observation period, the impeacher will become the new Master.

name: 角色详情
title: Character Details
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Character Details</style></size>
<sprite=10>Here, you can see character information such as their level, rank, gear, skills, etc. 
<sprite=10>You can tap to view the character's trait, class, and category. 
<sprite=10>You can equip characters with skills, gear, and Tarot Whispers.

name: 铃兰之剑佣兵团
title: Sword of Convallaria Mercenary Group
text:
Welcome to the Sword of Convallaria! This is the Leader's Office. The main storyline will gradually unfold as management decisions are made.
The instructions in the lower right corner of the screen will show you the next steps!

name: 荣耀之战3
title: Clash 3
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Division</style></size>
Iron: 0 - 249 Glory
Bronze: 250 - 399 Glory
Silver: 400 - 549 Glory
Gold: 550 - 699 Glory
Platinum: 700 - 899 Glory
Radiant: 900 Glory and above

name: 征服之塔（场景环境）
title: Field Environment
text:
Activate Environment Effect
And make clever use of the environment to have an edge in battle.

name: 提示插卡
title: Mysterious Voice
text:
Human! Remember to place the Tarot Cards in the [Astrarium] <style=yellow>on the left side of the dock</style> before setting off! 
<style=brown>This is the only way to illuminate 
new beacons on [The Fool's Journey].</style>

name: 大型活动-战术养成
title: Tactical Awakening
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Information</style></size>
<sprite=10>During the event, you can obtain TP through [Diorama] to unlock Tactical Awakening nodes.
<sprite=10>[Attributes] and [Tactics] obtained in Tactical Awakening only apply to the current event.
<sprite=10>[Tactics] take effect only when equipped and can be changed before deploying.
<sprite=10>The number of [Tactics] that can be equipped will gradually unlock as you progress through the event stages.

name: 小型活动-商城兑换1
title: Time-Limited Event Info
text: Difficulty and event quests are settled based on the number of [Challenge Topics] selected after clearing them.

name: 小型活动-商城兑换2-未用
title: Time-Limited Event Info
text: The level of stage selected affects the initial difficulty. Choosing Challenge Topics will increase the difficulty further, enabling more quests to be completed. [Rumor Point] earned in quests can be exchanged for rewards.

name: 小型活动-商城兑换3
title: Time-Limited Event Info
text:
<size=32><style=C4>■ Basic Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>Before starting, you can select [Challenge Topics] to increase difficulty, and the highest historical difficulty is recorded upon clearing.
<sprite=10>The higher the current stage, the higher the initial difficulty.
<sprite=10>Selecting [Casual Topics] does not record the difficulty upon clearing.
<sprite=10>Achieve designated Difficulty Levels to complete quests and earn [Rumor Point] for exchanging for rewards in the shop.

<size=32><style=C4>■ Other Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>Entering an event stage does not consume Endurance, and challenges can be done repeatedly.
<sprite=10>After the event ends, you cannot enter the event stages; however, rewards can still be exchanged for during the exchange period.

name: 沙盒商会
title: Trading Post
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>[Orders] are divided into event quests and freedom quests, which can be dispatched by loading cargo, and various rewards are obtained upon completion.
<sprite=10>In [Caravans], you can view ongoing and pending orders. Some orders require battle before settlement.
<sprite=10>[Trading Post] displays the development level, abundant produce, and hot commodities of each active trading post.

name: 中型活动3-累计兑换
title: Time-Limited Event Info
text:
<size=28><style=C4>Basic Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>After an event starts, players can complete the designated stages to collect Trading Post Credit Vouchers. Upon reaching specific amounts, rewards can be claimed.
<sprite=10>Additional drop bonuses are available after using recommended characters (except the first clear).
<sprite=10>Some stages will unlock as the event unfolds; there are two modes to choose from: a Free Mode (with your own Elysium characters) and a Strategic Mode (where trial characters are provided).
<sprite=10>You can switch between the modes and get the first pass rewards respectively. The clearing of either mode will unlock the subsequent challenges.

<size=28><style=C4>Other Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>[Extra Rewards] times will be refreshed at 00:00 a.m. every day.
<sprite=10>Once an event ends, you cannot enter the event stages.

name: 逆境之塔1
title: Tower of Adversity I
text:
Beneath the vortex of the Sea of Chaos, the ancient seals have begun to loosen. 
The power from "Inversion", the other side of the world, has now revealed itself…

name: 逆境之塔2
title: Tower of Adversity II
text:
<size=28><style=C4>■ Basic Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>Tower of Adversity is divided into the Shallow and the Deep, unlocking the Deep after completing all the Shallow stages.
<sprite=10>During the challenge, changing team characters, gear, or upgrading is not allowed.
<sprite=10>Adversity Value is tallied after clearing, and rewards are based on the highest Adversity Value achieved in that round.
<sprite=10>Challenge attempts are deducted upon failure, with 1 attempt restored every 30 minutes.

<size=28><style=C4>■ Refreshing and Ranking Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>Deep stages periodically update enemies, environments, and mutations. Rewards reset after each update.
<sprite=10>After clearing within the Subjugation Period, rankings are calculated based on the highest Adversity Value achieved in that round.
<sprite=10>During the Publicity Period, final rankings can be viewed, and ranking rewards can be collected.

name: 征服之塔3
title: Tower of Conquest III
text:

<sprite=10>[Lv.1] total rewards - Hope Luxite x200 , Conqueror's Insignia x180

name: 逆境之塔3
title: Tower of Adversity III
text:
<size=28><style=C4>■ Adversity Value Acquisition Rules</style></size>
<sprite=10>Adversity Value is calculated based on core and additional scoring items after clearing, with core items having a significant impact and additional items less so.
<sprite=10>In core scoring, fewer rounds used and fewer defeated characters yield a higher Adversity Value.
<sprite=10>In additional scoring, the more cumulative overflow damage (only against bosses when present), the less cumulative HP loss of characters, and the fewer actions in the final round, the higher the Adversity Value gained.
<sprite=10>When the Subjugation Period starts, the highest score in the Deep is taken as the final score.
